PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03052021-04-19,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Motor Vehicle Safety Act
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY ACT in order to (a) replace outdated noise emissions provisions with updated testing standards in the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations; and (b) update the winter tire definition and use of a new standard reference tire in the Motor Vehicle Tire Safety Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0083 Publication Date: 2021-04-28
AttachmentsAttachment
